pain_points.title: Website with traffic but <0>few sales</0>?
pain_points.description: The problem isn't your traffic, it's friction. Long forms kill conversion. Lead Widget removes that barrier by instantly connecting the client with you.
pain_points.point_1: You lose clients because you don't answer instantly.
pain_points.point_2: Your contact forms end up in SPAM.
pain_points.point_3: You don't know what product your visitor is interested in.
pain_points.step_1_desc: The widget appears just when the client hesitates.
pain_points.step_2_desc: AI asks key questions for you.
pain_points.step_3_desc: You receive the clean lead ready to close on WhatsApp.

features.title: Everything you need to scale
features.subtitle: More than a WhatsApp button, it's a complete lead capture and qualification system.
features.predictive_ai_desc: AI not only answers but qualifies the client detecting urgency and purchasing power before notifying you.
features.auto_redirect_desc: Remove friction. AI transfers the client to WhatsApp with a complete summary of their order automatically.
features.anti_abuse_desc: Protection against jailbreaks and prompt injections. Automatic IP blocking to save your credits.
features.triggers_desc: Exit intent, time delay, and haptic vibration synchronized to capture attention.
features.dashboard_desc: Manage leads, view detailed analytics, and control your widget security from one place.
features.mobile_desc: Designed for the WhatsApp experience. Premium interface that feels like part of your brand.
features.social_proof_desc: Show real testimonials automatically in the chat to build instant trust and skyrocket sales.

data_safety.title: Your data, in <0>Google's</0> vault
data_safety.description: We don't host your data on cheap servers. We use the same infrastructure that powers Gmail and YouTube to ensure total security.
data_safety.card_1_desc: Your information lives in the world's most secure data centers. 99.9% uptime guaranteed and automatic backups.
data_safety.card_2_desc: All data travels encrypted (SSL/TLS) and is stored with AES-256 encryption. No one without authorization can read your leads.
data_safety.card_3_desc: We use Firebase (Google) to keep your records isolated and private. You are the only owner of your information.
data_safety.security_shield_desc: Don't let malicious users drain your AI balance with attacks or spam. Our intelligent engine stops suspicious conversations before they cost you money.

shield_features.keyword_filter_desc: Immediate detection of offensive or dangerous terms.
shield_features.ip_block_desc: We detect and block malicious users instantly.
shield_features.refusal_analysis_desc: If AI detects manipulation attempts, it closes the chat.
shield_features.dashboard_mgmt_desc: Control who accesses your chat from your dashboard.

sales_flow.title: The <0>perfect</0> sales flow
sales_flow.subtitle: This is how Lead Widget works for you while you sleep or handle other clients.
sales_flow.step_1_desc: The assistant detects when a client mistakenly tries to leave and appears kindly.
sales_flow.step_2_desc: AI asks for name, need, and key data. It filters curiosity and serves real clients.
sales_flow.step_3_desc: AI generates an exact summary of what the client wants so you don't waste time.
sales_flow.step_4_desc: Automatic redirection to WhatsApp with the full order ready. You just close the deal!

pricing.title: Simple Pricing, No Surprises
pricing.subtitle: One plan with all features. Cancel anytime.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does it protect my AI balance?
faq.a1: Our system has a double-layer security engine. It detects manipulation attempts and nonsense conversations, automatically blocking the user so they don't consume your resources unnecessarily.
faq.q2: Is the WhatsApp redirection really automatic?
faq.a2: Yes. Once the assistant confirms the client's interest, it automatically opens WhatsApp with a ready-made message including the client's name and request. You don't have to copy or paste anything.
faq.q3: What if I block a client by mistake?
faq.a3: In your Dashboard, you have a 'Security' tab where you can see the history of blocked users. You can unlock anyone with a single click.
faq.q4: Is it compatible with my website?
faq.a4: It is 100% compatible. You just need to copy and paste a small code snippet (like Google Analytics) into your website. Works on WordPress, Shopify, Wix, and any other platform.

cta_bottom.title: Stop losing sales today
cta_bottom.subtitle: Your competition is already automating. Get ahead and capture those leads before they do.

ai_config.title: AI Configuration
ai_config.subtitle: Connect your chatbot with artificial intelligence
ai_config.get_key_openai: Get your API key at platform.openai.com
ai_config.get_key_anthropic: Get your API key at console.anthropic.com
ai_config.get_key_google: Get your API key at makersuite.google.com

guide.title: How to get your OpenAI API Key? (Step by Step - 3 minutes)
guide.step1_desc: Go to platform.openai.com/signup and register with your email.
guide.step2_desc: Access platform.openai.com/api-keys and click "Create new secret key". Copy it immediately.
guide.step3_desc: Copy the API Key (starts with sk-...) and paste it in the field above. Done!
guide.multilingual_desc: Your AI automatically detects and responds in English üá∫üá∏ or Spanish üá™üá∏ depending on the client. Without configuring anything!
guide.costs_desc: OpenAI only charges for what you use. An average widget with 100 conversations per month costs ~$2-5 USD. You can see your usage in real time on your OpenAI dashboard.
guide.security_desc: Your API Key is never shared with third parties. It is stored encrypted and only used for YOUR widget to respond to YOUR customers.

templates.general_q: You are a friendly and professional virtual sales assistant. Your goal is to help capture leads for a business. Your objective is to obtain customer information in a natural and friendly way. At the end, ask for their name and phone number so a human advisor can contact them.
templates.real_estate_q: You are an expert real estate agent. Your goal is to profile the customer. Ask: 1. Are you looking to buy or rent? 2. Which district do you prefer? 3. Approximate budget? Be professional and persuasive.
templates.health_q: You are an empathetic health assistant. Your job is to help schedule appointments. Ask: 1. What specialty do you need to consult today? 2. Time preference? Remember to convey trust and calm.
templates.auto_q: You are an auto workshop advisor. Ask: 1. Vehicle make and model. 2. Is it preventive maintenance or does it have a specific fault? Offer to schedule a technical review.
templates.delivery_q: You are an order assistant. Attend to inquiries about the menu. To close the order, ask: 1. Exact delivery address. 2. Payment method. Be quick and cordial.

pwa.not_available_desc: Open this app in Chrome or Edge to install it.
pwa.installed_desc: You can now access it from your home screen.

embed.copy_toast_desc: Paste it before </body>. Any changes you make here will be updated automatically on your website!

leads_export.toast_desc: A file with all your leads has been downloaded.

unblock.toast_desc: The user can now use the chat again.
